snippet: The city attorney of San Francisco asked the maker of Monster energy drinks to substantiate its claim that the beverages were safe for adolescents and adults.
abstract: San Francisco city attorney Dennis J Herrera asks Monster Beverage, maker of Monster energy drinks, to substantiate its advertising and marketing claims that beverages are safe for adolescents and adults; action is latest aimed at energy drink industry.
lead_paragraph: The city attorney of San Francisco asked the maker of Monster energy drinks to substantiate its claim that the beverages were safe for adolescents and adults.

headline.seo: Safety of Monster Energy Drinks Questioned
headline.main: San Francisco Questions Maker of Energy Drinks About Their Safety
headline.print_headline: San Francisco Questions Maker of Energy Drinks About Their Safety
